Before I possibly re-invent the wheel, I thought I'd ask if anyone has
already developed a Design of Experiments interface to NEAT that normalizes
the experiment functions into inputs, biases and outputs?  If not, is this
something that the group would find useful?
 
=============================
Kenneth A. Lloyd
